content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Live the ultimate Dragon Age™: Inquisition experience with the Deluxe Edition!
• Skyhold Throne - Every ruler should sit in a place of high honor, but as the Inquisitor you will have the greatest of all, fashioned from an ancient dragon skull.
• Red Hart - Navigate the perilous, living world atop this great-horned beast.
• Bog Unicorn - Once belonging to an evil marauder, this unique mount has returned to inspire fear into those who would oppose you.
• Bring the world of Thedas wherever you go with the digital soundtrack.
• Bonus digital content - to be announced!
The Deluxe Edition also includes the mighty Flames of the Inquisition Armor, Armored Mount, and Weapons Arsenal!



Additional hardware required for Interconnectivity.

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


1 player
Network Players 2-4
45MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Interconnectivity PS4™ • PS Vita
1080p HD Video Output
Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2014 Electronic Arts (Studio and Publishing). All rights reserved.
